Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by us due to its high-quality materials, innovative features, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Considering its unparalleled benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $140. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while offering you an attractive deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
